doc:
Lee Bryant https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Bryant 0 Lee Bryant (born August 31, 1945) is an American actress. She is perhaps best known for the role of Mrs. Hammen in the 1980 film Airplane! and the 1982 sequel (the role being best known for Mrs. Hammen getting hysterical on the plane in the original film, with the result being she gets slapped numerous times by numerous people). She also appeared as Sam Waterston's wife in the 1977 conspiracy thriller Capricorn One, and as Jennifer Westfeldt's mother in the romantic comedy Friends with Kids (2011). Bryant was born in Manhattan, New York. She has guest starred in a number of notable television series including T. J. Hooker, Marcus Welby, M.D., Charlie's Angels, Kojak, Three's Company, Starsky Hutch, Lou Grant, The Incredible Hulk, St. Elsewhere, Moonlighting, Alien Nation, and other series.
